question.title: Hide Android/data/package_name/ folder to restrict user to access it directly from internal storage
question.body:
in my app's storage structure, Data are being stored inside Android/data/package_name/file_folder I want to restrict the user to access this files directly from file explorer in Android Kotlin/Java. kindly suggest something except renaming files with prefix of "."(Dot) that's not permanent solution.

i couldn't get any proper solution to implement it correctly.
